content: also available on tlc yarn wrappers for free **from the website ** classic ripple crochet pattern is easy to learn and fun to make when combined with our new tlc baby amore this beautiful blanket is the perfect gift for baby and oh-so-soft **pattern # ** lt1531 **supplies ** tlc® baby amore™ art e520 5 ounce/224 yard solid 4 ounce/179 yard multi ball 7 ounces no 9832 light blue ca and 7 ounces no 9001 white cb yarn needle
